code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{SignalContactModal}from'./system/SignalContactModal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Hero(){const[isSignalModalOpen,setIsSignalModalOpen]=useState(false);const GITBOOK_LINK="https://dancingchimp.gitbook.io/dancingdragons/";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-4 py-8 bg-gray-900",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-md mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"mb-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-5xl font-bold text-orange-500",children:"Discover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-5xl font-bold text-orange-500",children:"Adventure"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-5xl font-bold text-orange-500",children:"Together"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-gray-300 mb-12",children:"Join a community of women exploring life's greatest adventures through movement, meditation, and meaningful connections."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsSignalModalOpen(true),className:"w-full bg-orange-500 text-white rounded-full py-4 text-lg font-semibold",children:"Join Our Community"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:GITBOOK_LINK,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"w-full inline-block border border-gray-700 text-white rounded-full  py-4 text-lg font-semibold",children:"Learn More"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignalContactModal,{isOpen:isSignalModalOpen,onClose:()=>setIsSignalModalOpen(false)})]});}export default Hero;
